synopsis.text: This office worker, Ryou Fujihashi, and her firefighter boyfriend, Souma Mizuno, are in the honeymoon phase of their relationship, cherishing every moment together. However, an unexpected visitor threatens to disrupt their bliss: Ryou's ex-boyfriend, Rei Hidaka, who suddenly appears at their workplace. Despite Ryou's initial reluctance to engage with him, she finds herself partnering with Rei, stirring up old memories from their school days and challenging her commitment to Souma. The series features both explicit and censored versions, with the latter airing on Tokyo MX.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
